long_description: Warm those icy toes up in the women's Acorn Mikka slippers, featuring beautiful suede leather uppers and comfy wool fleece linings. Supple, water-resistant, suede leather uppers feature contrast whipstitching and embossed details for great looks. Wool fleece linings provide warmth, cushioning and moisture management to keep bare or socked feet dry and comfortable. EVA footbeds are topped with wool fleece for added comfort underfoot. Lightweight, shock-absorbent EVA midsoles cushion every step; crepe rubber outsoles offer ample traction and long-lasting wear. Closeout.
short_description: Warm those icy toes up in the women's Acorn Mikka slippers, featuring beautiful suede leather uppers and comfy wool fleece linings.
